lead_paragraph: A significant chunk of the New York fashion world that should otherwise be in London joined A-listers such as Gwyneth Paltrow and Julianne Moore for the designer’s show.

headline.main: On Oscars Weekend, Tom Ford Draws the Starriest Front Row of the Fashion Season

snippet: A significant chunk of the New York fashion world that should otherwise be in London joined A-listers such as Gwyneth Paltrow and Julianne Moore for the designer’s show.
